## PipelineOptions interface

Options for configuring a pipeline.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PipelineOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [destroyProcess?](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.destroyprocess.md) |  | () =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ An optional function to clean up resources when the pipeline is destroyed. |
|  [emitter?](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.emitter.md) |  | [EventEmitter](./pipeline.eventemitter.md) | _(Optional)_ An optional custom event emitter to use for the pipeline. |
|  [errProcess?](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.errprocess.md) |  | (error: any, context: [PipelineContext](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [MaybePromise](./pipeline.maybepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean&gt; | _(Optional)_ An optional function to handle errors that occur during the execution of the pipeline. |
|  [globalParams?](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.globalparams.md) |  | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | _(Optional)_ Optional global parameters to be used by all steps in the pipeline which will be inserted to pipe's context self\_params |
|  [onProgress?](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.onprogress.md) |  | (completed: number, total: number) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ An optional callback function that gets called during the pipeline's execution to report progress. |
